overview:
Joe Cistaro is Vice President of Sales and Operations at CATS Technology Solutions Group in East Brunswick, NJ 08816.

He has been with CATS Technology for 5 years and has developed his market with “Stone not sand” fundamentals. He understand the Small to Midsize business market. His expertise is built on 15 years of progressive responsibility and experience.

He has has significant expertise in HealthCare IT and Consulting in the space.

He is constantly thinking of “new ideas” for different market penetration in the IT space.

He is married with two children and lives in Parsippany, NJ.
